mapper.select: SELECT cr.account_id, s.student_name, s.student_gender, a.attendance_state, a.attendance_remark FROM class_registration cr LEFT OUTER JOIN student s ON cr.account_id = s.account_id LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance a ON cr.account_id = a.account_id AND WHERE cr.class_registration_state = "수강중" OR cr.class_registration_state = "수료" AND cr.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} ORDER BY s.student_name
